segments.text: From my vantage, the kitchen appears ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, engrossed in her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is running unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water floods out, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows, lapping at her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains unaware, towel twisting around the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the boy scales his stool like a mountain climber.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies with glee from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool wobbles ominously beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below pleads with open hands for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their adventure feels so innocent yet risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how close disaster is.
segments.speaker: PAR
